participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and enthusiastic, Alex loves expressing himself through art and finds joy in colorful surroundings.
participant_1.background: I wear bright colors and patterns to make me feel more confident and energetic. I like to draw other people. I married Miss USA. It takes me an hour to drive to work in the morning. Both my parents were teachers.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Jordan is warm-hearted and nurturing, finding fulfillment in teaching and connecting with her students.
participant_2.background: I'm not sure I could pick just one, but building a house for my family was definitely one of the hardest things I've ever done. I have won tap dance competitions. I enjoy mushroom ravioli with my Doberman. I sometimes cuss in my videos because I think it makes them more entertaining, but I know that it's not appropriate for everyone. I have driven a race car before.

content.text: Hi there!
Hello there!
What's your favorite thing to do in your free time?
I love to watch YouTube videos and play video games. How about you?
I enjoy drawing and watching YouTube videos.
Oh cool! I've never been much of an artist, but I love to watch art tutorials. What kinds of things do you like to draw?
I mostly draw people and animals, but I'm trying to get better at drawing landscapes.
I've always wanted to be able to draw people, but I'm not very good at it. It's really hard to get the proportions right!
It definitely takes a lot of practice! I've been drawing for years, and I'm still learning new things all the time.
That's really impressive! I can't imagine having that kind of patience.
Thanks! It's something I've always loved doing, so it doesn't feel like work to me.
I'm glad you have something you love to do! That's really important.
It is! I think everyone should have something they love to do, even if it's not something that they're good at.
I agree! It's important to have something to look forward to and to relax with.
Exactly! So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a teacher.
Oh cool! What grade do you teach?
I teach kindergarten.
That must be fun! I've always thought that kindergarten would be a great age to teach.
It is! It's so much fun to see the kids learn and grow.
That's awesome! I'm sure you're a great teacher.
Thanks! I try my best
